title: How long does it take to write a comic book script? - Quora

response.answer_text: Depends on the writer. The script for Alan Moore’s Watchmen is out there on the internet someplace and it is the length of a phone book, it is so detailed. On the other hand, Stan Lee’s and his crew used to get some of their work ironed out in 30 min phone calls.
As long as the writer needs, its all in the quality above quantity but precisely speaking at bare minimum a week to write the script.
